channel.title: CVE Feed for snipe -- snipe-it
channel.description: The latest CVEs for snipe -- snipe-it

item.title: CVE-2022-23064|2024-08-03T03:28:43.275Z -- snipe -- snipe-it
item.description: In Snipe-IT, versions v3.0-alpha to v5.3.7 are vulnerable to Host Header Injection. By sending a specially crafted host header in the reset password request, it is possible to send password reset links to users which once clicked lead to an attacker controlled server and thus leading to password reset token leak. This leads to account take over.

item.title: CVE-2024-5685|2024-08-01T21:18:06.834Z -- snipe -- snipe-it
item.description: Users with "User:edit" and "Self:api" permissions can promote or demote themselves or other users by performing changes to the group's memberships via API call.This issue affects snipe-it: from v4.6.17 through v6.4.1.
